code: var BASE_URL="/api/users/";function save(savedWord){console.log(localStorage);var token=localStorage.getItem("token");console.log("I made it to the storage service");console.log(savedWord);return fetch(BASE_URL+"savedWord",{method:"POST",headers:new Headers({"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token}),body:JSON.stringify(savedWord)}).then(function(res){console.log("we got a result! "+res.json());console.log("res is okay!");}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});}function saveDoc(savedDoc){console.log(localStorage);var token=localStorage.getItem("token");console.log("I made it to the storage service");console.log(savedDoc);return fetch(BASE_URL+"savedDoc",{method:"POST",headers:new Headers({"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:token}),body:JSON.stringify(savedDoc)}).then(function(res){console.log("we got a result! "+res.json());console.log("res is okay!");}).catch(function(error){return console.log(error);});}export default{save:save,saveDoc:saveDoc};
